data.client_settings: Discord Stable, Build Number: 16727, Version Hash: d3400266c1788b6d6174c229e39842e66a9336bf
data.actual_result: The channel isn't marked as NSFW at all.
data.expected_result: A /!\ warning sign should become visible, indicating the channel is marked as NSFW.
data.short_description: Naming a text channel something containing the word "nsfw" doesn't auto-set the channel to NSFW
data.steps_to_repro: - Create a new text channel - Name it something containing "nsfw" - Observe the channel's # symbol
